name: Slime Crown
description:
A little Slime found the "Slime Crown", now he has the Power to change his Color at will. He is superior to any Slime of the same Color and sets out to become the new "Slime King".

Slime Crown is a "Color Change"-Game, with a absolutly unique Gameplay like you never played it before. If you like challenging Pixel-Games, then you will love it.

Features:

- Retro Style
- Pixel Graphic
- Chiptune Sound
- Unique Gameplay
- 10 Chapters
- Many Bosses

I hope you like it!
